feed.title: Seamus Meehan - Blog
feed.subtitle: A blog to help me remember the technologies I have learned.

entry.title: Welcome to the Blog!
entry.content:
This blog is intended to be a mix of personal notes for my learning along with some notes about projects I am currently working on.

I suppose this is a decent place to introduce myself. I am currently a consultant specialising in process automation.

Opening an image in someoneâ€™s .bashrc is a bad idea.
entry.summary: This blog is intended to be a mix of personal notes for my learning along with some notes about projects I am currently working on.
